name: LujoEmotes
description: A Premium Minecraft plugin that transforms player interactions by offering custom emotes for deaths and assassinations.

features.name: PlaceholderAPI Integration
features.description: Allows to obtain with placeholder api all the information of the emotes of players.

features.name: Easy Files config
features.description: The configuration files are easy to use.

features.name: Fully customizable
features.description: You can create your own animations.

features.name: All language support
features.description: Translate it to the language of your choice.

features.name: MythicMobs
features.description: You can summon things that are not animations, if you want to use it for another purpose when you die, for example a minion.

features.name: ModelEngine
features.description: You can invoke entities/animations with custom 3d models with ModelEngine.

name: BasePlugin
description: BasePlugin is a comprehensive Minecraft development solution, providing tools and APIs for custom plugin creation. This project streamlines plugin development, enabling creators to focus on innovation.

features.name: All in one
features.description: Allows development for both Spigot and BungeeCord within the same project

features.name: Modular
features.description: Enables generation of JAR files with only the essentials

name: BlockCounter
description: It is a placeholderExtension which gives us the information of a block with its placeholder.

features.name: Simple
features.description: Simple and minimalist use and installation

name: Murcis Luis Network Web
description: Our Minecraft server website is a dynamic and vibrant platform where users can engage with the community through various features. We offer a comprehensive forum system where players can discuss strategies, share experiences, and solve queries. The blogs allow users to express their creativity, post Minecraft-related news, and keep the community updated on server events. Additionally, the site includes a comment section and a like system, facilitating interaction among members and promoting a collaborative and friendly atmosphere. Our website is designed to be the central meeting point for all server fans, providing a rich online experience that complements in-game adventures.

features.name: Responsive
features.description: The website is fully responsive, allowing users to access content from any device, whether it's a computer, tablet, or smartphone, ensuring an optimal user experience across all platforms.

features.name: Blogs System
features.description: Designed for simple and minimalist use and installation, the blog system enables users to easily create and share content, keeping the community informed and engaged.

features.name: Forum System
features.description: Our forum system offers a straightforward and minimalist platform for players to discuss topics, exchange ideas, and resolve queries, fostering interaction and mutual support within the community.

features.name: Comments System
features.description: With easy and minimalist configuration and installation, the comments system allows users to interact with content efficiently by sharing opinions and feedback.

features.name: Updates from Server
features.description: We provide constant and easy-to-manage updates about the server, keeping the community informed about the latest changes, improvements, and events.

features.name: Design Friendly
features.description: The website features a simple and minimalist design that facilitates use and installation, ensuring users can navigate and find the information they need without complications.
